name: smokestack
content:

a tall, vertical pipe that takes smoke or steam into the air from an engine driven by steam or from a factory

a tall, vertical pipe through which smoke or steam leaves a building or engine

Add to word list
a tall chimney on a factory: Residents complained that fumes from the smokestacks made breathing difficult. If Los Angeles can reduce the emissions coming from its smokestacks, its residents will generally breathe cleaner air.
